name: get_users_detail_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_video_feature_summary.
Tool description: Contains TikTok && Douyin HD videos without watermark and user, post, music, search, feeds, comments, followers, and trends. And if you need any help you can send me private message or Email : labppabp@hotmail.com, Telegram (https://t.me/voyagell)

API description: Fetch detailed user information from the TikTok Video Feature Summary API.

unique_id.description: The unique identifier for the user. Default is 'voyagel'.
